name: .JBEAM
summary: Learn about .JBEAM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: JBEAM files are not meant to be opened. Instead, games using the BeamNG engine reference JBEAM files for vehicle behavior in the game.

However, since the files are saved in a text-based format, you can open and edit them with source code or plain text editors. Source code editors, such as Microsoft Visual Studio Code, are better options than simple text editors since they provide syntax highlighting capabilities.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .jbeam file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.8
images.caption: JBEAM file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code 1.8
